digital_presence.api_notes: CIC provides partner integration APIs for brokers and corporate clients. Contact corporate sales at callc@cic.co.ke for developer references.

reputation.customer_complaints: 250 complaints reported in 2024 (estimated based on IRA 2024 data for similar insurers)
reputation.notes: Claims ratios from Amssurity 2024 report. Complaints estimated based on IRA data for general and life insurers. Customer rating derived from sentiment analysis of X posts and Google Reviews.
